name: BIOTICA
description:
A simple game built off of Conway's game of life.

To play, use "WASD" (or "arrow keys") to move, and "SPACE" (or "z") to progress the stage of life. Press "r" to restart the level.

Travel to the door to get to the next level.

This game was created only with JavaScript and HTML, so please excuse glitches or bugs for now.

Enjoy :]
